ai-kv2.1:1.3_0: There is a perfected one, sensual desire for sensual pleasures, passion for sensual pleasures, bondage, infatuation, and sensual desire.

ai-kv2.1:31.3_0: Having given up the defilements, the abandoning of greed, hate, and delusion, and the fetters of rebirth, old age, and death. He should be completely understood. He should develop the noble truth of the fetters of rebirth, old age, and death, to be given up. He should develop the noble truth of the origin of suffering, the worry, and the path. He should be completely understood. He should be given up by direct knowledge and complete understanding, finishing, and giving up.
